text: Activities are interesting and teacher  Ying Fen is genuinely patient and great with kids. Great learning experience. Lessons are always creative and hardly repetitive.

Both my kids love attending Heguru classes and they are always looking forward to it! As a parent, I also enjoyed attending the classes with them.  It’s very engaging and fun and I do think that it  helps in my kids development! Special thanks to Teacher Yingfen and Teacher Enhui for their enthusiasm and patient to the kids. They are very encouraging too! :)

Best enrichment for my little one, she love the song and super flash..
Teacher Ashley is cute, friendly and super patience to children ❤️
My child has been with Heguru Method CCK for more than 3 years and it has been great! Her teachers (Enhui and Ying Fen) are dedicated and help my child in her learning journey. Thank you!
Teacher Yingfen is always patient with the kids and encouraging. My child enjoys her class very much. As a parent, I also learn how to better engage with my child. Highly recommend Heguru!
